description:
I was prompted to install software during the interview with Web3Space (web3space.dev).  Later I realized they were a scam company and my wallets had been drained.The following shows the flow of funds stolen by the hackers. 0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef Trail (SOL)Hacker destination address: https://solscan.io/account/FTz7BHvocVWvWGG9jwFwoLU9H4bTemrGkKQd99T57U9My original address is this: https://solscan.io/account/C9ocz1JuaqjY16HRnXksc9GgdhcncBKo28aMFRDwrYWRA series of unstake requests were made and the final funds were transferred to hacker address in below transaction:https://solscan.io/tx/3DB5uBq3toa4tBsbuPtJsUiL3jUSZA4PU1a97RJ3mtcyfisqfW1NnVa9zZM2zdR1zmDCwgVoCCn6cMmii7PMMpBCAs of 2025-11-10, the funds are still sitting in the hacker address: https://solscan.io/account/FTz7BHvocVWvWGG9jwFwoLU9H4bTemrGkKQd99T57U90x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef Trail (BSC)Hacker destination address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaefMy original address is this: https://bscscan.com/address/0x5b5970ee025923f59aad8ded095f908f57909615Funds were sent to this hacker address via the following transactions:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2266d71ae8c04bcb009cebab9e4522619651a2929fa77cd9081927d0cfde23acFunds were swapped into XRP and WETH:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x82e9dea4e4f3f0136fe24edd6e48e96020ed53350c48d8a795fbcd1487b681e3https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2185f05fbf0d7494d932ac491985c89eafbd859c204309e53ef7e4e370c92bb3The funds were transferred to the destination hacker address:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x9aa1c40f83b7973c79886f46088472038fd02cf41c3b430e689a1590a533a7e7https://bscscan.com/tx/0x4c23221cdf183b596735bbe890ec7a10dc2ba8c5fd9952fdb9fa244682483590As of 2025-11-10, the funds are still sitting in the hacker address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838b Trail (BSC)Hacker origin address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838b (funds transferred to OKX)My original address is this: https://bscscan.com/address/0x5b5970ee025923f59aad8ded095f908f57909615Funds were sent to this hacker address via the following transaction:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2266d71ae8c04bcb009cebab9e4522619651a2929fa77cd9081927d0cfde23acFunds were swapped into XRP and WETH and sent to hacker address 0x0d46b:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x82e9dea4e4f3f0136fe24edd6e48e96020ed53350c48d8a795fbcd1487b681e3https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2185f05fbf0d7494d932ac491985c89eafbd859c204309e53ef7e4e370c92bb3As of 2025-11-10 half of the swapped XRP still reside in the hacker address 0x0d46b (~1059 XRP):https://bscscan.com/address/0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838bThe WETH were transferred to the another hacker address:https://bscscan.com/tx/0xc4172504a1791eb7224800a1a812d02fb1f9382d3cbc8671c5408bd39f6bcfbaFunds were then transferred into Kucoin 28:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x8de48e5ebce7a915e641cd5c2b131b1d51675eae219de5efe8d0b0298325e90chttps://bscscan.com/tx/0xea56a6acddd5c72d094df1ce3eed167133750b7f249815eafd054239f3352f83https://bscscan.com/tx/0x94663e543fb71b0a9545b5865c9a11fca369fdb2272af4aab9dd89999272d0afThe funds were swapped into SOL transferred to external wallet DuDN3 through Kucoin:https://solscan.io/account/DuDN3UjnTFZZpB6STs3ohMBMAUeuUp8jMgkgD9nP6bAP#transfershttps://solscan.io/tx/2BeNJZgaChhZHAzb4Br9MJbiAhFtCNhb3BK2rKfXXgVzrdxhBhhUt8GNrmedU56tXaDv6WD24N79mxcHF7yquSuahttps://solscan.io/tx/5r7NvLaePq2r39RcfmenchppUvrRNteh1wNb4DK98QZFG1Us9nz3YUFXtt8uuVFTh3t9paboPQomMfPUFSdk9Azihttps://solscan.io/tx/rmMSizaaWKiGwaiZPjhst3AmG4Gx9bTzoXoXixuiBav2G6SShoVygLrKQyVsgn4m9PgLcFTyy8erYfQXkvZS6ejThen the funds were transferred to external address Az5Tc:https://solscan.io/account/Az5Tc7wPa9jCcZMisRj2GbDB2San91zcWMCRvi7X31s6#transfershttps://solscan.io/tx/4euScHyPR2Zb2Q7326bTLY9krXmd4ZarWVfvPKijtSgezvnQ5aur2AKREbtyzJkpJuFK1JNSm8ZF8yvz44nmVRPghttps://solscan.io/tx/5bbkzJfagJMZSYnzJtPgPWMqJggCHnzQNGyWAG4xEskMnX23fACAGq8HgUzmAnQDGt2evZ1BXccnawkBqbKPnep7https://solscan.io/tx/2g1iexEBnLsJS7YDgaVy15DcJBtg3J9PJWvcm9wvCr9mJCY31HSwH9JDuAo5ct1rNe5YAhQoE5A9sLxSfU4NewCwhttps://solscan.io/tx/37v4iZz2KCaNGvk17UA9jA1EXWsa4ZkWgMZJkK5YJKejU1FfDVkqod9k2MCAiKuenxjE4VT5AwTicdp5YNNSMnPdFinally the funds were transferred to OKX Hot wallet:https://solscan.io/tx/3MD7dxWN19VXQ8TyTdMHi4R4bNC2jsL6A9pts9YeQfPTcDdnBjuvPYvQf2nnWAh9SBcQJWmy8vD5T8MWsQG9zcCKhttps://solscan.io/tx/4EGzv4A7xbRD7zevg2kk5DonJttixVhuFnzCX8wjPX7zG5e9f2tqCcoYrABgzgkddX4PwTy1XSfi3WZVAZpgiTjjhttps://solscan.io/tx/4xKm45ceYFKKFyqwu1YXR7kbpkbVq8cCHNGThPos9Lyp4D6vLbpRZ26dfPLrHr99k1VpojnAtTDxJCaUhHiytBoZhttps://solscan.io/tx/5ZLQs4ZwiQp9Q45YvgNbAKwPRyArNniPbSEifgPawwQKZmj6TfcKUrSVpxXsD5cgjDqoAx39PnUjNJ4q633WNrDTThis case has been resported to local Hong Kong police with Police reference number STRN 25030659.

I was prompted to install software during the interview with Web3Space (web3space.dev).  Later I realized they were a scam company and my wallets had been drained.

The following shows the flow of funds stolen by the hackers.

0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef Trail (SOL)

Hacker destination address: https://solscan.io/account/FTz7BHvocVWvWGG9jwFwoLU9H4bTemrGkKQd99T57U9

My original address is this: https://solscan.io/account/C9ocz1JuaqjY16HRnXksc9GgdhcncBKo28aMFRDwrYWR

A series of unstake requests were made and the final funds were transferred to hacker address in below transaction:

https://solscan.io/tx/3DB5uBq3toa4tBsbuPtJsUiL3jUSZA4PU1a97RJ3mtcyfisqfW1NnVa9zZM2zdR1zmDCwgVoCCn6cMmii7PMMpBC

As of 2025-11-10, the funds are still sitting in the hacker address:

https://solscan.io/account/FTz7BHvocVWvWGG9jwFwoLU9H4bTemrGkKQd99T57U9

0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef Trail (BSC)

Hacker destination address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef

My original address is this: https://bscscan.com/address/0x5b5970ee025923f59aad8ded095f908f57909615

Funds were sent to this hacker address via the following transactions:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2266d71ae8c04bcb009cebab9e4522619651a2929fa77cd9081927d0cfde23ac

Funds were swapped into XRP and WETH:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x82e9dea4e4f3f0136fe24edd6e48e96020ed53350c48d8a795fbcd1487b681e3

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2185f05fbf0d7494d932ac491985c89eafbd859c204309e53ef7e4e370c92bb3

The funds were transferred to the destination hacker address:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x9aa1c40f83b7973c79886f46088472038fd02cf41c3b430e689a1590a533a7e7

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x4c23221cdf183b596735bbe890ec7a10dc2ba8c5fd9952fdb9fa244682483590

As of 2025-11-10, the funds are still sitting in the hacker address:

https://bscscan.com/address/0x0220ea3b1b64b9b0a361553dabc8480607abbaef

0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838b Trail (BSC)

Hacker origin address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838b (funds transferred to OKX)

My original address is this: https://bscscan.com/address/0x5b5970ee025923f59aad8ded095f908f57909615

Funds were sent to this hacker address via the following transaction:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2266d71ae8c04bcb009cebab9e4522619651a2929fa77cd9081927d0cfde23ac

Funds were swapped into XRP and WETH and sent to hacker address 0x0d46b:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x82e9dea4e4f3f0136fe24edd6e48e96020ed53350c48d8a795fbcd1487b681e3

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x2185f05fbf0d7494d932ac491985c89eafbd859c204309e53ef7e4e370c92bb3

As of 2025-11-10 half of the swapped XRP still reside in the hacker address 0x0d46b (~1059 XRP):

https://bscscan.com/address/0x0d46b7bcce0c8f2fefd1e5501a3f507c28f1838b

The WETH were transferred to the another hacker address:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0xc4172504a1791eb7224800a1a812d02fb1f9382d3cbc8671c5408bd39f6bcfba

Funds were then transferred into Kucoin 28:

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x8de48e5ebce7a915e641cd5c2b131b1d51675eae219de5efe8d0b0298325e90c

https://bscscan.com/tx/0xea56a6acddd5c72d094df1ce3eed167133750b7f249815eafd054239f3352f83

https://bscscan.com/tx/0x94663e543fb71b0a9545b5865c9a11fca369fdb2272af4aab9dd89999272d0af

The funds were swapped into SOL transferred to external wallet DuDN3 through Kucoin:

https://solscan.io/account/DuDN3UjnTFZZpB6STs3ohMBMAUeuUp8jMgkgD9nP6bAP#transfers

https://solscan.io/tx/2BeNJZgaChhZHAzb4Br9MJbiAhFtCNhb3BK2rKfXXgVzrdxhBhhUt8GNrmedU56tXaDv6WD24N79mxcHF7yquSua

https://solscan.io/tx/5r7NvLaePq2r39RcfmenchppUvrRNteh1wNb4DK98QZFG1Us9nz3YUFXtt8uuVFTh3t9paboPQomMfPUFSdk9Azi

https://solscan.io/tx/rmMSizaaWKiGwaiZPjhst3AmG4Gx9bTzoXoXixuiBav2G6SShoVygLrKQyVsgn4m9PgLcFTyy8erYfQXkvZS6ej

Then the funds were transferred to external address Az5Tc:

https://solscan.io/account/Az5Tc7wPa9jCcZMisRj2GbDB2San91zcWMCRvi7X31s6#transfers

https://solscan.io/tx/4euScHyPR2Zb2Q7326bTLY9krXmd4ZarWVfvPKijtSgezvnQ5aur2AKREbtyzJkpJuFK1JNSm8ZF8yvz44nmVRPg

https://solscan.io/tx/5bbkzJfagJMZSYnzJtPgPWMqJggCHnzQNGyWAG4xEskMnX23fACAGq8HgUzmAnQDGt2evZ1BXccnawkBqbKPnep7

https://solscan.io/tx/2g1iexEBnLsJS7YDgaVy15DcJBtg3J9PJWvcm9wvCr9mJCY31HSwH9JDuAo5ct1rNe5YAhQoE5A9sLxSfU4NewCw

https://solscan.io/tx/37v4iZz2KCaNGvk17UA9jA1EXWsa4ZkWgMZJkK5YJKejU1FfDVkqod9k2MCAiKuenxjE4VT5AwTicdp5YNNSMnPd

Finally the funds were transferred to OKX Hot wallet:

https://solscan.io/tx/3MD7dxWN19VXQ8TyTdMHi4R4bNC2jsL6A9pts9YeQfPTcDdnBjuvPYvQf2nnWAh9SBcQJWmy8vD5T8MWsQG9zcCK

https://solscan.io/tx/4EGzv4A7xbRD7zevg2kk5DonJttixVhuFnzCX8wjPX7zG5e9f2tqCcoYrABgzgkddX4PwTy1XSfi3WZVAZpgiTjj

https://solscan.io/tx/4xKm45ceYFKKFyqwu1YXR7kbpkbVq8cCHNGThPos9Lyp4D6vLbpRZ26dfPLrHr99k1VpojnAtTDxJCaUhHiytBoZ

https://solscan.io/tx/5ZLQs4ZwiQp9Q45YvgNbAKwPRyArNniPbSEifgPawwQKZmj6TfcKUrSVpxXsD5cgjDqoAx39PnUjNJ4q633WNrDT

This case has been resported to local Hong Kong police with Police reference number STRN 25030659.

Amount lost

160000.00 USD

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

web3space.dev

web3space.network
